alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Madison; Polk; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 9:54AM CDT until June 29 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN POLK...NORTHERN MADISON...DALLAS AND NORTHERN WARREN COUNTIES... At 954 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Badger Creek State Park, or 9 miles south of Adel, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Des Moines, West Des Moines, Urbandale, Johnston, Clive, Indianola, Waukee, Norwalk, Pleasant Hill, Grimes, Winterset, Adel, Windsor Heights, Carlisle, Dallas Center, Earlham, De Soto, Van Meter, Southridge Mall and Jordan Creek Town Center. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 51 and 72. Interstate 80 between mile markers 97 and 131. Interstate 235 between mile markers 1 and 11. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
